div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: As you are aware, the Governor has closed all Indiana Schools through the end of the current school year. Please see this link for the latest updates and reminders.
Updated information for teachers, parents, and students can be found here.
To preempt the spread of COVID-19, SSC will be closed next week (3/16 - 3/20). Please see Mr. Green's latest communication here. Specific information and instructions for eLearning can be found here.
